channel.title: Multiple safezones?

item.title: Multiple safezones?
item.dc:creator: @mikescott mikescott
item.description:
@mikescott wrote:

Nope. its like this:

if((absX >= 2932 && absX <= 3068 && absY >= 3328 && absY <= 3394)||(absX >= 2794 && absX <= 2815 && absY >= 9189 && absY <= 9213)

theres a || in between every set of them. :]. So my enitre code would look like this:

[code]public boolean nonWild() {
if((absX >= 2932 && absX <= 3068 && absY >= 3328 && absY <= 3394)||(absX >= 2794 && absX <= 2815 && absY >= 9189 && absY <= 9213)||
heightLevel == 1)

return true;
else
return false;
}[/code]

item.title: Multiple safezones?
item.dc:creator: @ChemicalReaction1 ChemicalReaction™
item.description:
@ChemicalReaction1 wrote:

If i wanted to add multiple safezones, would it be like this?

public boolean nonWild() { if (absY >= 2752 && absY <= 3520 && absX <= 3838 && absX >= 2112) if (absY >= 3169 && absY <= 3673 && absX <= 3159 && absX >= 3669) return true; else return false; }
I got error when i put that?
